page.title: 13WILLOUGHBY FARM GR. 288428
page.content: {Willoughby Farm}has been in the{Ashton family since 1939. The house is 120 years old. The farm is{fragmented}and} is{600 acres}in all. It is an{arable farm growing{oil seed rape}for cooking oil and margerine,{spring barley}for malting,{winter wheat}for cattle feed, and{grass}for hay and sillage.The crops are{rotated}in order to prevent disease and help the soil. He keeps 112 cattle and raises them for beef. At present he has 50 calving and 26 heiffers. They have 7 tractors,one caterpillar,2 ploughs,1 sprayer and a combine witgh 16 foot cut. They sometimes hire a baler and bale about 1000 bales of sillage each year.
